casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 28, 2006

[Cite as 09/28/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-4992.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-2264. State v. Diar.

Lorain C.P. No. 04CR065248. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Lorain County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion is granted pending disposition of this appeal.
